name: TAMED (demo)
description: Your a saleman flying through space when you run out of fuel. You have to go to the nearest planet and collect fuel cells, so you can make it to your sales pitch. You don't have weapons, just the GooPoo protein bars. Throw them and creatures, some will eat and let you ride them. Use the creatures ablilities to find the fuel cells and bring them to your ship.  This game was inspired by the NES classic Little Nemo Dreammaster
